recordType.name: EAP HD Request

a:fieldCfg.name: Year
a:fieldCfg.a:facetExpr:
a!localVariables( local!status:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items: enumerate( year(today())-2014 ), expression: 2014+fv!index ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterList"( name:"year", options:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items:local!status, expression:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterListOption"( id:fv!index, name:fv!item, filter:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field:"requestYear", operator:"=", value:tointeger(fv!item) ) ) ) ) )

a:fieldCfg.name: Month
a:fieldCfg.a:facetExpr: a!localVariables( local!status:#"_a-0000e4c3-ab68-8000-5250-1bef901bef90_7827"( categoryGroup:"Run time Configuration", type: "PROCESSING_MONTH", pagingInfo:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"( startIndex:1, batchSize:-1, sort:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"( field:"sort_order", ascending:true() ) ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterList"( name:"Month", options:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"( items:local!status, expression:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordFilterListOption"( id:fv!index, name:fv!item.label, filter:#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"( field:"requestMonth", operator:"=", value:tointeger(fv!item.code) ) ) ) ) )

a:relatedActionCfg.a:staticDescriptionString: Click Here To Upload Bulk Historical Data
